biotools.summary: This package was designed to help researchers/lab managers wanting to cary out capture sequencing experiments. The R-package supeRbaits, written in R and C++ and implemented in R, can help design your own set of baits from a genome sequence of your species of interest.

bioschemas.name: supeRbaits
bioschemas.summary: This package was designed to help researchers/lab managers wanting to cary out capture sequencing experiments. The R-package supeRbaits, written in R and C++ and implemented in R, can help design your own set of baits from a genome sequence of your species of interest.
